entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
